T02D2018:78a-1: rakta ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D2018:78a-3: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2018:78a-4: gshin rje gshed dmar la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2018:78a-5: bdud bzhi po ni rnam par 'joms //
T02D2018:78a-6: dpa' bo drag po sgrol mdzad pa //
T02D2018:78a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad //
T02D2018:78a-9: thog mar gnas dben par bdud rtsi lnga la sogs
T02D2018:78a-10: pa'i ril bu khar bcug nas bdag nyid ro'i thog
T02D2018:78a-12: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang ldan pas bla ma dam pa la mchod par bya'o //
T02D2018:78a-13: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha ssarba dha rma:sva bh'a ba shuddho & ham /
T02D2018:78a-14: aom yog shuddha:sarbba dharmma: yo ga shuddho nyaham /
T02D2018:78a-15: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2018:78a-16: yam yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2018:78a-17: kha dog sngon po yam gis mtshan pa gzhu'i dbyibs
T02D2018:78a-18: lta bu / de'i thog tu ram dmar po yongs
T02D2018:78a-19: su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha
T02D2018:78a-20: dog dmar po 'bar bas mtshan pa /
T02D2018:78a-21: bam yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po /
T02D2018:78a-22: kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pa /
T02D2018:78a-23: lam yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru
T02D2018:78a-24: bzhi pa kha dog ser po rdo rjes mtshan pa
T02D2018:78a-25: / sum yongs su gyur pa las ri bo mchog
T02D2018:78a-26: rab gru bzhi rin po che'i rang bzhi can lcog
T02D2018:78a-28: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2018:78a-29: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2018:78a-30: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mtshan //
T02D2018:78a-31: dra ba dra phyed brgyan byas shing //
T02D2018:78a-33: de'i dbus su pam gyur pa las sna tshogs padma /
T02D2018:78a-34: de'i lte bar h'um gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D2018:78a-35: de las skyes pa'i dbyug to nyi ma'i dkyil du
T02D2018:78a-36: sa bon dang bcas pa de yongs su gyur pa
T02D2018:78a-37: las / dpa' bo gshin rje gshed zhal gcig phyag
T02D2018:78a-38: gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po nyi ma bye ba'i
T02D2018:78a-39: las / 'od can / phyag g-yon na bdud ma lus pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa /
T02D2018:78a-40: phyag g-yas na khams gsum rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyug to dkar po /
T02D2018:78a-41: brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can klu brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa /
T02D2018:78a-44: khro bo'i tshul gyis bzhad pa'i ljags 'gyur ba /
T02D2018:78a-45: nyi ma lta bu'i spyan gsum zlum pa /
T02D2018:78a-46: zhal khro gnyer can sku sbom pa /
T02D2018:78b-0: rtsib @78b logs dang gsus pa che ba /
T02D2018:78b-1: sku dang yan lag dang nying lag thung zhing 'od 'bar ba /
T02D2018:78b-2: dbu skyes dang sma ra ser zhing 'bar ba can /
T02D2018:78b-3: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams pa /
T02D2018:78b-4: brgya phyed mi mgo'i phreng ba can /
T02D2018:78b-5: rdo rje ro langs mas yang dag par 'khyud pa /
T02D2018:78b-6: lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba /
T02D2018:78b-7: phyag g-yon na gnas pa'i thod par gdug pa bdud kyi khrag 'dzin pa /
T02D2018:78b-8: g-yas na rdo rje gri gug / ma he'i thog
T02D2018:78b-9: tu zhabs g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D2018:78b-10: // shar gyi 'dab mar gti mug gshin rje gshed
T02D2018:78b-11: badzra rtsa rtsi ka la 'khyud pa sku mdog dkar
T02D2018:78b-12: // po / lho'i 'dab mar ser sna gshin rje
T02D2018:78b-13: gshed sku mdog ser zhing phag mo la 'khyud pa
T02D2018:78b-15: gshin rje gshed sku mdog dmar po dbyangs can ma
T02D2018:78b-16: dang yang dag par ldan pa /
T02D2018:78b-17: byang gi 'dab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed
T02D2018:78b-18: sku mdog ljang gu goo r'i dang yang dag par
T02D2018:78b-19: ldan pa / tsi rtsi ka nag mo /
T02D2018:78b-24: g-yas na gri gug phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2018:78b-25: dpa' bo ji ltar phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa can /
T02D2018:78b-26: me'i mtshams su mu men gser chab kyi bum pa tsa tu sa mas bkang ba ;
T02D2018:78b-27: bden bral du gser gyi bum pa ka stu ris bkang ba /
T02D2018:78b-28: rlung gi mtshams su byi ru'i bum pa sihlas bkang ba /
T02D2018:78b-29: dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyis bkang ba /
T02D2018:78b-30: kha thod pas bcad pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2018:78b-31: de nas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dang /
T02D2018:78b-33: ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya ba dang /
T02D2018:78b-34: bzlas pa'i dmigs pa gang bzhin byas te /
T02D2018:78b-35: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2018:78b-37: aom hoom kshoom ksha yam ka ra ya /
T02D2018:78b-38: grihna grihna h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2018:78b-39: nye ba'i thugs kyi snying po'o //
T02D2018:78b-40: aom ma h'a yaksha se n'a dhi pa ti ye /
T02D2018:78b-41: ma h'a du rdnta d'a maka / n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
T02D2018:78b-42: bi dra pa ya bi dra pa yam h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2018:78b-46: tru ta tr'u ta h'um dza:sv'a h'a /
T02D2018:78b-48: aom mo h'anta kri ta h'um h'um phat /
T02D2018:78b-49: aom pi shu n'anta krita h'um h'um phat /
T02D2018:78b-50: aom r'a g'nta krita h'um h'um phat /
T02D2018:79a-3: aom mo ha ra ti h'um dza:/
T02D2018:79a-4: aom bi shu na ra ti h'um dza:/
T02D2018:79a-5: aom r'a ga ra ti h'um dza:/
T02D2018:79a-6: aom airshya ra ti h'um dza:/
T02D2018:79a-7: dpa' mo dbang phyug ma bzhi'i sngags so //
T02D2018:79a-8: dang po mi mgo gsum gyi steng du padma'i snod du bskal pa'i me 'am /
T02D2018:79a-9: rdo rje lta bur 'bar ba can /
T02D2018:79a-10: de'i nang du zan dang chu bsres la /
T02D2018:79a-11: go ku da ha na 'o ma mar dang rgya
T02D2018:79a-12: skyegs 'dres ma'i khu ba lta bu yang dag par
T02D2018:79a-13: bltas la bsil bar gyur par bsams la /
T02D2018:79a-14: dza:h'um bam ho:sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02D2018:79a-15: de nas mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D2018:79a-16: bsil bar gyur pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o /
T02D2018:79a-18: // / aom rakta mu ku t'a ya /
T02D2018:79a-23: rakta ka munda m'a l'a bha ra n'a ya /
T02D2018:79a-24: rakta ra tha sa ma ru dh'a ya /
T02D2018:79a-34: bhra ma ya bhra ma ya /
T02D2018:79a-37: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
T02D2018:79a-38: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D2018:79a-40: bhe da bhe da h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2018:79a-41: de nas so so la dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2018:79a-42: aom aindr'a ya na mo hr'i:ya m'a ya na ma:shtri:/
T02D2018:79a-43: ba ru n'a ya na mo wi /
T02D2018:79a-44: ku be r'a ya na ma:kri /
T02D2018:79a-45: a'i sh'a n'a ya na ma: ta /
T02D2018:79a-47: nee r'i ta ye na mo na /
T02D2018:79a-48: ba ya be na mo na /
T02D2018:79a-51: brahma na ye na ma phat /
T02D2018:79a-52: ba sum dh'a ra yee na ma phat /
T02D2018:79a-53: be ma tsi tra ni na ma:sv'a /
T02D2018:79a-54: sarbba bhu te bhyo na mo h'a /
T02D2018:79a-56: h'um h'um phem phem sv'a h'a /
T02D2018:79a-57: aom marmme marmme bi ga te h'um /
T02D2018:79a-58: badzra tsa rtsi ka / ha ra ha ra /
T02D2018:79a-59: bhukkem m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D2018:79a-61: aom gho ne su gho ne /
T02D2018:79a-67: ksho bha ni badzra sa ra sva tyee /
T02D2018:79a-72: dhu na dhu na h'um h'um aa mu kam dza:dza:/
T02D2018:79a-76: ta pra ye goo r'i ye /
T02D2018:79a-77: aa mu kam dza:dza: shing gcig dang dur khrod dam ri'i rtse mor byung ste /
T02D2018:79a-78: kha lho phyogs su bltas gcer bur byas nas /
T02D2018:79a-79: hr'i:shtri: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na /
T02D2018:79a-80: de nas 'di 'grub par 'gyur la the tshom med do //
T02D2018:79a-81: sngags kyi cho ga gsungs te /
T02D2018:79b-1: rje btsun gyi thang ka bkram la /
T02D2018:79b-2: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas
T02D2018:79b-3: dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon sum du dmigs
T02D2018:79b-4: nas / mi rus kyi smyu gus khrag chen dang /
T02D2018:79b-5: bya rog gi khrag bsres pa bri gzhi sor bcu
T02D2018:79b-6: gnyis kyi tshad la 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis kyi
T02D2018:79b-7: dbus su rlung gi sa bon de'i lta bar dgra'i
T02D2018:79b-8: ming tsheg drag dang bcas pa kha sbyar du byas
T02D2018:79b-9: te bya rog gi ske la btags nas /
T02D2018:79b-10: gal te ma bkrol na de ru chags par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2018:79b-11: de nyid du bri bar bya ba'i sa bon bcu
T02D2018:79b-12: gnyis ni phat phat h'um h'um na na t'a kri
T02D2018:79b-13: bishtri:hr'i:aom / ji ltar 'byor pa'i p'u dza byas nas /
T02D2018:79b-15: gal te 'bab chu la rab tu bsgyur na /
T02D2018:79b-16: de nas mi gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2018:79b-17: de ma yin pa bya rog gi sgro la lan
T02D2018:79b-18: gsum bsngags te dgra'i sgo gong du sbas na 'khor
T02D2018:79b-19: dang bcas pa de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur
T02D2018:79b-20: ro // de bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis
T02D2018:79b-21: pa de nyid kyi dbus su tsha sna gsum dang
T02D2018:79b-22: ro // / dug dang ske tshe rnams kyis rus
T02D2018:79b-23: chen gyi smyu gus me'i sa bon dbus su tsheg
T02D2018:79b-24: drag dang bcas pa'i gha:gnyis kha sbyar la /
T02D2018:79b-25: tha gnyis kyis phyi nas bskor te /
T02D2018:79b-26: bud shing gi me la bsros na /
T02D2018:79b-27: bu dang bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2018:79b-28: 'di man ngag la 'khor lo gnyis kha sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2018:79b-29: yang na mi'i rus pa sor bzhi'i tshad la lan
T02D2018:79b-30: bdun sngags bzlas nas dgra bo'i sgo ru sbas na
T02D2018:79b-32: de bzhin du sa bon bcu gnyis pas de kho
T02D2018:79b-33: na yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis
T02D2018:79b-34: pa'i dbus su tsandan nam bo de tse'i shing ngam
T02D2018:79b-35: / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngo rigs kyi shing
T02D2018:79b-36: gi smyu gus chu'i sa bon gyi dbus su bam
T02D2018:79b-37: de gnyis kho na kha sbyar la /
T02D2018:79b-38: tha gsum gyis phyi nas bskor te /
T02D2018:79b-39: 'o mas bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas na /
T02D2018:79b-40: zla ba gang ba lta bur rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2018:79b-41: de bzhin du sa bon bcu gnyis pa de nyid
T02D2018:79b-42: kyis yongs su bskor bar 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis
T02D2018:79b-43: kyi dbus su rgya skyegs kyi yi ge h'um gis
T02D2018:79b-44: bskor ba'i ho:gnyis kha sbyor nang du ming bcug ste
T02D2018:79b-45: / yungs kar dang mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gyur na /
T02D2018:79b-46: lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02D2018:80a-0: @80a * // lto 'phye chen po dang mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D2018:80a-1: gnod spyin dang srin po dang rgyal po gdug pa
T02D2018:80a-2: can la sogs pa khol po dang khol mo lta
T02D2018:80a-3: bur nye bar dbyung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2018:80a-4: 'khor lo bris nas ro bsregs pa'i sol bas ling+ga
T02D2018:80a-5: bris la rkang pa g-yon pa'i mthe bo ches mnan
T02D2018:80a-6: te / sngags bzlas pas gong bu dgug pa'o //
T02D2018:80a-7: de bzhin du snying gar hr'i:dmar pos mtshan par bsgoms nas bzlas na /
T02D2018:80a-9: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kram t'a na na ts'a la ya p'a da ts'a la ne h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2018:80a-10: aom hr'i:shtri: wi kram t'a na na pa tya de pa data tam /
T02D2018:80a-11: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D2018:80a-12: ra ram ra ram ham h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2018:80a-13: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na dzi bam ba ra ta h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2018:80a-14: aom rakta r'u pa sarbba satva /
T02D2018:80a-15: da ma ka / stvam bha ya /
T02D2018:80a-17: hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'an na h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2018:80a-18: hr'i:che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis shig /
T02D2018:80a-19: hr'i:tsheg drag dang bcas pa dza: gnyis kyi bar du
T02D2018:80a-20: bcug pa ni rkang pa dgug pa'o //
T02D2018:80a-21: rim pa ji lta bar sngags kyi tshig rnams go bar bya'o //
T02D2018:80a-22: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um /
T02D2018:80a-24: gha:gha:h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2018:80a-25: zho dang 'o ma 'dres pa'i zan la sogs pa'i spyin sreg gis rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2018:80a-26: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na he he h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2018:80a-27: grong gi phyogs su gtor ma btang ste /
T02D2018:80a-28: dbus su til gyi spyin sreg byas na /
T02D2018:80a-29: bdud kyi gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2018:80a-31: dmar ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad brlag par mdzad pa'i don to //
T02D2018:80a-32: 'das dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum ni spyan gsum mo //
T02D2018:80a-33: phyag gnyis ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rtog pa 'joms pa'o //
T02D2018:80a-34: stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med par ldan pas na shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2018:80a-35: klu brgyad ni rnam par shes pa brgyad rab tu ston pa'o //
T02D2018:80a-36: mi mgo brgya phyed kyi phreng ba ni yi ge lnga bcu dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2018:80a-37: g-yon pa'i thod pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bkang ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2018:80a-38: g-yas pa'i dbyug to ni phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2018:80a-39: lha'i bu dang 'chi bdag gi bdud bzhi bcom zhing snying rje'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2018:80b-0: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas ni khams @80b gsum rab tu ston pa'o //
T02D2018:80b-1: bdud bzhi khrag gi ro dang bcud len dpag tu
T02D2018:80b-2: med pa myong bas na lha mo'i g-yon gyi phyag
T02D2018:80b-3: na thod pa'o // g-yas kyi gri gug gi dngos po dang /
T02D2018:80b-4: dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu gcod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2018:80b-5: gdug pa can 'dul ba ni khro bo'i gzugs can no //
T02D2018:80b-6: gsus pa 'phyang ba ni mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o //
T02D2018:80b-7: dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa ni /
T02D2018:80b-8: sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang /
T02D2018:80b-10: lam gyi bden pa rab tu ston pa'o //
T02D2018:80b-11: sgo bzhi ni bdud bzhi skrag par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2018:80b-12: zur bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rab tu gang ba'o //
T02D2018:80b-13: ka ba brgyad ni rmi lam lta bu dang dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /
T02D2018:80b-14: brag ca dang sgyu ma'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2018:80b-15: smig rgyu dang me long gi gzugs brnyan dang /
T02D2018:80b-16: chu'i zla ba lta bu dang /
T02D2018:80b-17: nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon te dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2018:80b-18: nang gi rtog pa 'joms pa ni dra ba phyed pa'o //
T02D2018:80b-19: rta babs bzhi ni spyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang /
T02D2018:80b-20: don mthun pa dang don dpyod pa dang ldan zhing bab tu spang ba bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2018:80b-21: gshin rje gshed dmar sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D2018:80b-22: byas pa'i bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02D2018:80b-23: de yis 'gro ba ma lus kun //
T02D2018:80b-24: bdud bzhi las ni thar bar shog / gshin rje
T02D2018:80b-25: gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon shr'i bi
T02D2018:80b-26: r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
